title: Full Stack Website
shortDescription: An overview of the role of a full stack developer.
fullDescription: A full stack developer is a computer professional who builds and maintains both the front-end and back-end of a website or application. Front-end: The parts of a website that users see and interact with. Back-end: The behind-the-scenes data storage and processing. Full stack developers are responsible for the entire software lifecycle, from user interface design to database management. They can create entire web applications and ensure that all software works together seamlessly.
